```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy.linalg import null_space
>>> A = np.array([[1, 1], [1, 1]])
>>> ns = null_space(A)
>>> ns * np.copysign(1, ns[0,0])  # Remove the sign ambiguity of the vector
array([[ 0.70710678],
 [-0.70710678]]) 
```

```py
>>> from numpy.random import default_rng
>>> rng = default_rng()
>>> B = rng.random((3, 5))
>>> Z = null_space(B)
>>> Z.shape
(5, 2)
>>> np.allclose(B.dot(Z), 0)
True 
```
